metadata.title: CVE-2023-50009 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Buffer Overflow vulnerability in Ffmpeg v.n6.1-3-g466799d4f5 allows a localattacker to execute arbitrary code via the ff_gaussian_blur_8 function inlibavfilter/edge_template.c:116:5 component.

criterions.comment: ffmpeg package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
